Yes. I grew up in the city.
wasn't Johnny Manziel susposed to save that team?
This morning when I met my friend, I had indigestion. I passed gas and it smelled terrible.
When I met my friend for coffee this morning, I had indigestion. I passed gas and it smelled terrible.
Why didn't you walk away lol
Oh, believe me, I would've walked away if I could've. I was so embarrassed.
You should of try to let it out slowly.
mom got sick and i blamed myself
Earlier this year my mom got really sick and ended up in the hospital. I feel like I should have been more vigilant about her health.
So sorry to hear about your Mom - I do hope she's better now. In my personal experience, you can watch and advise all you like, but they often won't listen - my Mom was like that.
Yes, that's true, they won't always listen. Still I can't help but beat myself up about it, and feel like I could have done more. I'm trying to get past the feeling of guilt, but it's hard.

Please don't be so hard on yourself. It's sometimes hard to remind ourselves that our parents are people in their own right and, while we care very much about them, at the end of the day they'll do what they think is right.
Thank you so much for your comforting words. At least she is doing a bit better now. I guess I have to accept that there is only so much I can do.
Exactly! You have to do your thing and she has to do hers. Just by being there if she needs help, you're doing so much for her!
That is a really good point. Thanks again so much.
You are very welcome. I've been there :)
I can't believe I lied to my mother.
I can not believe I lied to my mother.
What was it about?
About why I needed to borrow money.
What did you spend it on?
I feel so guilty.  I cheated on my husband.
I feel so guilty.  I cheated on my husband.
Oh no, what happened to cause the cheating?
I just lost control.  I feel horrible for doing it.  But it just had to be done.
Have you guys talked about it? Or is he still upset?
My son got in big trouble at his school.  I felt so embarrassed when it happened.
My son got in big trouble at school.  He was very mean to his best friend, and I had to call his mom and explain what had happened.
That's terrible when friends fight. What was it over?
He wasn't even upset with his friend, he was upset with someone else.  I felt so bad having to explain it to his friends mom.
That's got to be a tough phone call to make. Did you two make amends or is she very upset?
She was fine with it.  She knew he was in big trouble at home.
Uh oh don't want to be that kid that's for sure!
I was caught in a drunken rage.
Yesterday I got so drunk, I shouted at my wife and made a mess in my house.
Oh no! You should never lash out on people while drunk, the worst of things can happen under the influence.
I agree, I am so ashamed right now. I cant even look at my wife in the eye anymore.
I think the best thing to do is talk to her and apologize. If you admit to you being foolish she may find it to forgive you.
Oh my gosh, I got home from the store and realized I forgot to pay for my dog food!!
I just don't know what to do. I was in such a rush. Should I go back?
No just go ahead and keep going.  It will be fine.
Are you sure? What if they got me on camera and accuse me of stealing next time I go in? It's my regular store.
If they would have had you on camera, they would have already come after you for it.  I wouldn't worry about it.
Ahhh good point
Yeah.  You're smooth.  You can do it no problem.
when my mom started yelling at someone in the store for no reason.
My mom has turrets and screams at people for no reason.
That must be very challenging to deal with at times.
It is very challenging to deal with, along with being very embarrassing. Sometimes I am ashamed of her.
I can understand being emabarrassed by that as well.
I stole candy from the store yesterday. Feel kinda bad about it.
I stole candy from the candy store yesterday.
did you feel like being spontaneous or just did it for the thrill of it
I just did it because I wanted some candy, but now I feel kinda bad about it.
next time you go in, put the money of the candy into one of those charity cans
I felt so bad when I saw that I had accidentally run over my neighbor's rose bush. She worked so hard growing her flowers.
I felt terrible when I realized I had accidentally run over my neighbor's garden. Oops!
Oh no! Did you end up talking to your neighbor about it??
No, I never did which made me feel even worse. I ended up sending an anonymous letter with some cash in it. I didn't want her to be mad at me.
Oh well that's a nice thing to do. I'm sure she forgives you because she knows you felt bad and wanted to make it right.
Sometimes I wonder where my life would be if I decided to not go to college. I feel embarrassed to say my major did not work out for me...

Do you ever get those moments where you wonder where life would be if you did one thing differently? Like for me, I always feel embarrassed to think if I hadn't gone to college, maybe my life would be easier?...
Of course, hindsight is 20/20. But going forward you can live in a way that minimizes regret.
I suppose that's true. I feel like sometimes my family may view me as a disgrace for not doing much with my life.
It's really not for them to judge. Do what makes you happy.
That is true. i have to think of that more often.
I know the feelings I had up until my 20's. Then I just realized how much they had no right to judge me.
I ate all of the leftovers today. It was enough to feed three people.
I made fried chicken, mashed potatoes, green beans and bisuits last night
That sounds soooo good! I'm eating low-carb right now but I'm a pushover for good mashed potatoes!
Well it was good and we were going to have them for dinner tonight, but I ate it all before the kids got home from school. Im terrible

They weren't upset. They got to eat McDonalds lol
I felt ashamed after I huge fight with my best friend that was my fault
Years ago me and my best friend got into a bad argument and I felt terrible later because I realized it was my fault

Yes, it took awhile, a couple months I think it was but we are closer now
That's good to hear. It's all water under the bridge now, as they say.
I was teaching my daughter to drive today.  In doing so, I got a speeding ticket.

Oh no, was the cop understanding
not really.  He gave me a ticket for speeding and running a stop sign, in front of my daughter!

I ate all the brownies I made.  Let's just say I'm not too proud of my self control.
I ate all the brownies I made. Let's just say I'm not too proud of my self control.
They must have been quite good.
Yeah, they were delicious, I'm ashamed I couldn't control myself!
I hope you have better control next time.
My puppy was biting his leash for the umpteenth time and I lost my temper and slapped his snout. I am embarrassed because I'm a grown adult and I know that's not how to teach or train a puppy.
I feel horrible. I lost my temper and slapped my dog :(
Thats not good, Did he do something to you?
Yes, he bit me. But he's only a puppy, it's expected behavior. I should have known better.
Im sorry but you should still never hit him. It could just make him bit again
Yeah, I lost my temper. I know that's no way to teach a dog.
I can't believe I used salt instead of sugar in the cake I baked.
I can't believe I used salt instead of sugar in the cake I baked.
Whoaa.... You probably had to throw that away immediately, huh? Don't worry, my sister-in-law forgot to put eggs in a cake one time and it came out like a brick.
Yes, it was a disaster.
Well, you live and you learn. At least you can bake, or try to. I don't hardly cook at all, besides simple things!
I never finished school. I had problems with my mental health and just stopped showing up to class. It was very hard for me.
I never finished school. I had problems with my mental health and just stopped showing up to class. It was very hard for me.
Oh no, are you feeling any better now? Or are you still having problems?
Well this was four years ago. I am barely starting to feel better now, I am in the beginning steps of going to vocational school
Oh, well that sounds like a step in the right direction at least. I hear vocational school is great for many different kind of jobs, usually more physical.
I took 100 dollars from my bosses wallet.  I feel so guilty for doing that.
I took 100 dollars from my bosses wallet.
Oh dear. Did they find out about it?
No, but I feel really guilty for doing that.
Maybe one day you could repay them?
I ate a whole pack of cookies
I ate a whole pack of cookies this morning.
LOL....Been there and done that. Don't feel guilty. What's done is done.
That's a good way to look at it
No need beating yourself up something you can't change. Got another pack?
sadly not

I once was talking about a coworker behind his back.  It wasn't necessarily an awful conversation; but what I didn't know was that he was working in the next room with the door open.  He approached and asked what I had been saying.  I knew I was caught.  I was so disgusted with myself.
The other week, I was talking about a co-working of mine - okay, I was gossiping..
Hmm, how did that make you feel
Pretty awful, actually.  Especially considering that the coworker of whom I was speaking was in a room just next door with the door open.
Yeah, at least now you're more aware, it can be pretty tough when you're trying to break the habit though
Absolutely.  I really am disgusted with myself.  I don't know why I open my big mouth!
I eat while I am asleep and I can't control it.
I eat while I am asleep and I can't control it, but I am humiliated by it.

I'm so sorry.  I have dealt with a lot of sleep problems and night panic attacks so I know how hard it can be dealing with things like that. I have a friend who does the same thing. Don't be humiliated.  You can't control it.
My doctor said I should tie myself up in a mummy sleeping bag so I can't get out.  I tried it a few times, but I tore the sleeping bag to get to the nighttime chocolate treats.
I hate those things!  They are so restrictive.  I wish I could remember the name of the medication that my friend is on that helped her...let me check with her and see if she texts me back.

That would be really helpful, thank you.  My doctor has written me off because he calls me an aggressive night eater.  Sometimes I find that I have ordered a pizza and ate right through the box to get to it.  I've never told anyone that before.

Don't feel any shame.  The medication is called Topomax.  It supposedly stops the receptors in the brain that trigger night sleep eating.  I also know that if you happen to take Ambien,a sleeping pill, go off of it because it actually can cause night sleep eating. Take care!
I'm in my late 20s and don't have a college degree.
I'm in my late 20s and don't have a college degree

I have been there before. Sometimes you just need to relax!
It is nice
It is, we all need time for ourselves!

It was soooooo good lol

The cake was just really good. I felt pretty bad afterwards.

when i lost my temper with my dad
I lost my temper with my father and said some rude things I shouldnt have said when I was younger.

I know I try not to but once you get older you realize it wasnt the nicest or brightest thing!
Oh I agree, I still feel awful about it myself! But I think our parents understand and don't take it to heart, because they usually did the same thing too :)

Oh well, shake it off and keep flaunting that nice car! :)

I went to church this past Sunday and the most horrible thing happened.  I literally still can't believe it!

Well, I called my pastor by the old pastor's name!  I wanted to cringe - he's not even that new, he's been here for like 2 years!

selling a family item

I failed my final exam. Now I'll lose my scholarship.
Oh man, that must be a horrible feeling.
It is. I don't know how to pay for school now. All my work money goes to rent.
There is always next year champ. Im sure you'll try harder next time.
I baked my new neighbors a nice meatloaf as a welcome gift. It went well until I got so hungry I had to eat a piece. Then I ate another piece. Next think I knew it was half eaten. I felt so bad.
I got new neighbors recently. I wanted to do something nice so I baked a meatloaf for them. The problem is it smelled so good I had to try it first.
Haha that's not a problem! You must be a good cook!
Yeah well it becomes a problem when I keep eating a little more until it is half gone. Now I have to bake another one! I felt so bad.
Hahaha that's funny. Sorry but i find that hilarious.
While walking in the mall I tripped no a carpet and busted my nose on the floor.
Yesterday I was walking in the mall and my foot caught the edge of a carpet on the floor, I ended up tripping and busting my nose on the floor!

I feel like my ego was hurt more than my nose, but yes, it hurt like hell!

One time I was traveling for work, and I had told my wife that I was staying in for the night, but really I went out for drinks with some people from work.

That was the only time, but was the last since I accidentally butt dialed her and she found out that I wasn't in my room.

I brought it on myself, so I can't complain too much.

Someone told me something at work that was inappropriate of them. I went behind them and told the manager what was said as I was concerned . Turns out the person was lying about even doing it and was fired for it.
So I accidentally got someone fired for something at work.
That sounds bad. I know it wasn't intentional but what happened?

The person bragged about doing something, that they didn't actually do. Which was highly inappropriate for the job we had. I had to tell the manager due to liability issues. All for it to not even be true.
Well you did what you were supposed to do. It's their fault for saying what they said.
I agree, but still feels bad to get someone fired at times.

I stole 1000 bucks from her

I don't know if you have experience with small children, but when my daughter was 3 years old, she spoke her mind all the time.

Numerous times!  The most memorable was when we were checking out at the grocery store.  The cashier was a man that had an earring.  She promptly (and very clearly and loud) told him "Boys don't wear earrings and you need a haircut"
Yikes, I hope they did not take that to heart too much...
I cheated on a lot on my homework in high school. I flunked out of college just because of that
I was a cheater in highs school. I always got some nerd to help me, bet now I really regret it.
We all do stupid stuff as kids.  The important thing is you realize how bad that behavior is now.
Yeah, but that  doesn't stop me from being upset about it.
I understand regret over previous actions, but you just got to move forward.
I was caught looking through old photos of an attractive friend on facebook. It was pretty bad to be called out for being a bit creepy.
You ever browse through old photos on a friend's Facebook page? Kinda weird right?
I have. Sometimes it's nice to see what old friends have been up to, and what new friends have done. I don't think it's too strange.
It is when it's an attractive friend...and it's obvious you're creeping on them. Man that's embarrassing.
That definitely changes things. I could understand how that might be considered weird, I agree.
We do dumb stuff when we're young. I don't think I'mma live that one down tho

I'm on a diet and things are going great! I'm trying to get fit for my wedding. One day I'm feeling a little blue, and decide it's a good idea to eat a full bar of chocolate, 3 packets of crisps and a 6 pack of beer. Definitely not helping my diet.
Hello.
Hi! Tell me something about yourself!
Well... I'm feeling incredibly guilty!
Oh no? I hope you're okay. Why is it that you feel guilty?
I am OK. I'm trying to get in shape for my wedding, but somehow managed to eat just about everything unhealthy in the house! So ashamed of myself!

Yes, I feel like a slob! I really need to get it under control!
